textAfterTable: Green rating 85% Reviews Sort by Most recent Rating - High to Low Rating - Low to High Great location, at the bus stop and very close to the glacier. Living room is very cozy and is the best place for relaxing. It is big and many cards and board games are provided. Free sauna room is recommended after a long day walk. Free canola oil can get at the reception. The staff are very helpful. 100% Bhathra, Wed 22 Apr 2015 Great spot. Well set out hostel. Good facilities.Friendly staff who were generally helpful. Improvements: perhaps bench in front of food cubby holes to take bags out to sort and not a table where people are sitting. Edges of carpet in bedroom were not clean next to walls. 90% Lynette, Mon 13 Apr 2015 pratiques environnementales: acceptables car à force
